Articles.Content: How does the community feel about a kerbal clicker game? If you don't know what I'm talking about then look at cookie clicker. Would be a neat community game if we could get approval from the KSP developers.
The Jeck? This is NOT a good idea!!! What would you be clicking for?? Making FUEL?!?!? No. No No No NO NO NO NO NO.

The Jeck? This is NOT a good idea!!! What would you be clicking for?? Making FUEL?!?!? No. No No No NO NO NO NO NO.

You'll obviously be sacrificing kerbals to improve your rockets/clicking speed! We all know that kerbals don't die being useless, they help whatever government there is on Kerbal keep on chugging!

You'll obviously be sacrificing kerbals to improve your rockets/clicking speed! We all know that kerbals don't die being useless, they help whatever government there is on Kerbal keep on chugging!

Little demented, even for KSP's standards :/ . Making fuel sounds more feasible.

Still, if you feel up to it, make it. From what I know (and this may be wrong), making free games from another thing is legal as long as its free and you don't claim the original creation is yours.

Little demented, even for KSP's standards :/ . Making fuel sounds more feasible.

Still, if you feel up to it, make it. From what I know (and this may be wrong), making free games from another thing is legal as long as its free and you don't claim the original creation is yours.

Well I can make it, its just that I have no clue on how exactly I should handle it while being in legal terms with Squad. Im guessing fuel could work. Kerbals are the work force and the rockets have to be fueled by clicking on Kerbals to pump fuel.

Well I can make it, its just that I have no clue on how exactly I should handle it while being in legal terms with Squad. Im guessing fuel could work. Kerbals are the work force and the rockets have to be fueled by clicking on Kerbals to pump fuel.

Yeah I think that's a good idea, and you can get refineries as extra stuff and so on.

Ask KasperVld. Hes the community manager and he can point you to the person to talk to. If you get the all clear, I'll actually HELP you with this game.

Oh and one last thing, once you find the guy who manages the legal stuff, send him my way. I have something I want to talk to him about as well.

Sure thing Zoo, I'll look into contacting KasperVld and if I must I'll just contact you on skype.

Sure thing Zoo, I'll look into contacting KasperVld and if I must I'll just contact you on skype.

Wait you know my Skype?? How?

Wait you know my Skype?? How?

Zoo, we were in the group on skype with Gag and many others.. Remember lol?

Zoo, we were in the group on skype with Gag and many others.. Remember lol?

That Brody, and yes I do XD .
